arguments.argument:
image_index = 0
message_caption(1, text) switch (text) { case 'single_player': ns_single_player() break case 'multiple_player': ns_multiple_player() break case 'exit': game_end() break case 'register': ns_register() break case 'login': ns_login() break case 'back': with (objTitleController) { for (i = 0; i < 3; i += 1) { inst[i].text = buttonText[i] } } break case 'logout': ns_logout() break case 'create_lobby': ns_create_lobby() break case 'join_lobby': ns_join_lobby() break case 'leave_lobby': ns_leave_lobby() break case 'start_game': ns_start_game() break }
